attributes.action: Stop the sale of NHS trust homes for people with learning disabilities
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The NHS are selling their homes for people with severe learning disabilities and putting them out to tender to private businesses - what measures are in place to protect these vulnerable people who live in them? - they cannot speak for themselves - often lived in the home for over 10 years and are familiar with their environment - it is disruptive and very frightening for them.What qualifications will the private buisness have in terms of skill and experience and nursing care? The NHS should not be selling.
